title: The Hippo Who Feared Vaccinations (Про Бегемота, который боялся прививок)
description: A charming tale about a timid hippo that helps you learn basic house vocabulary and how to express fears in Russian.

title: The Moody Cat (Капризная Кошка)
description: A charming dialogue between a girl and a very picky cat. Learn basic house vocabulary and how to express likes and dislikes in Russian.
